# Step Selection Analysis

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(glue)

library(amt)
```

```{r}
paths = list.files(path = "data/ssf_data", full.names = T)
```

```{r}
ssf_fits = lapply(paths, function(file) {
  
  data = fread(file)
  
  data = data[, list(
    steps = list(.SD)
  ), by = c("id", "growth", "type", "rep_")]
  
  ssf_fit = lapply(data$steps, function(df) {
    amt::fit_ssf(
      data = df,
      formula = case_ ~ items + agents + cell_r + strata(step_id_)
    )
  })
  
  data[, ssf_fit := lapply(ssf_fit, function(ssf_fit) broom::tidy(ssf_fit$model))]
  
  # extract weights and save
  data[, unlist(ssf_fit, recursive = F),
       by = c("id", "growth", "type", "rep_")]
  
  data
  
})

# save
save(ssf_fits, file = "data/data_ssf_fits.Rds")
```
